about_the_game: SENJU is a VR experience of traditional Japanese dance (Nihon-Buyo). It is developed in cooperation with Senju-Ryu school of traditional Japanese Dance. You can watch a master of Nihon-Buyo dance and study the motions in detail. Starting with 2 simple dances, this is the world's first VR app that allows you to learn traditional Japanese dance in an intuitive and enjoyable way. We offer 3 modes in our VR app: "Experience Mode" - Watch the teacher perform the dances and study without pressure. "Practice Mode" - Recreate the dance yourself and get real-time feedback. "Performance Mode" - Show off your skills on stage and share your performances over the internet. The SENJU app is currently under development, but you can already start using the prototype. All future updates will be provided free of charge.
